user_prompt: Create Epics and User Stories for the usecase

epics.title: Secure Authentication and Role-Based Access Control
epics.summary: Implement multi-factor authentication and role-based security mechanisms for user access.
epics.description: This epic focuses on implementing a secure authentication system using multi-factor authentication (MFA) to protect customer access. It also defines role-based access controls (RBAC) ensuring that users only interact with data and features permitted by their roles. The solution must include encrypted login sessions, session timeout policies, authentication logs, and alignment with banking security standards. Sensitive customer credentials and authorization data will be securely stored and managed under strict compliance guidelines.

epics.title: Personalized Dashboard and Profile Overview
epics.summary: Create a personalized dashboard displaying banking products and services tailored to the customer profile.
epics.description: This epic addresses the design and development of a dynamic user dashboard presenting relevant account information, product offerings, and recommendations based on user profiles. It will interface with internal data analytics and eligibility engines to provide personalized insights. The dashboard should also allow quick navigation to account management, transaction history, and service modification features while maintaining a visually appealing and intuitive layout.

epics.title: Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
epics.summary: Enable customers to open new accounts and modify existing services using guided digital workflows.
epics.description: This epic covers the implementation of structured and simplified workflows for account opening and service modification requests. Customers should be able to upload mandatory documents, validate data in real time, and save unfinished applications for later completion. The workflows must connect to the bank’s backend core systems via secure APIs for validation, approval, and request processing, providing transparency and efficiency throughout the process.

epics.title: Real-Time Status Tracking and Notifications
epics.summary: Provide customers with real-time status updates and automated notifications on all requests.
epics.description: This epic ensures that customers can monitor the progress of their requests, such as account openings or service changes, in real time via the portal. Automated notifications will be triggered at key stages and sent via email or in-app messages. The module should include configurable notification templates, event-based triggers, and integration with the core system to reflect live updates, enhancing customer engagement and operational transparency.

epics.title: Comprehensive Interaction History and Audit Trail
epics.summary: Maintain an extensive record of user interactions, requests, and activities for transparency and compliance.
epics.description: This epic focuses on building an auditable interaction history enabling users to view their past activities, requests, and changes to accounts or services. The audit trail will also serve compliance and security purposes, ensuring traceability and accountability. All entries must be immutable, encrypted, and easily retrievable for administrative or regulatory analysis. Historical data retention policies will comply with banking standards and customer privacy laws.

epics.title: Responsive and Accessible User Interface
epics.summary: Deliver a responsive, mobile-optimized, and accessible interface ensuring consistent performance across devices.
epics.description: This epic covers the creation of a responsive and accessible front-end design that guarantees seamless user experiences across desktop, tablet, and mobile devices. The interface design must comply with accessibility standards such as WCAG 2.1, ensuring usability for customers with diverse needs. It should feature adaptive layouts, scalable components, and minimal load times to ensure efficiency. User feedback mechanisms will be included for continuous usability enhancement.

epics.title: Core Banking System Integration and Data Management Layer
epics.summary: Integrate with core banking systems while ensuring independent, high-performance data management within the portal.
epics.description: This epic involves establishing secure integration between the self-service portal and the bank’s existing core banking architecture. APIs or middleware will be developed to synchronize requests, account data, and transaction processes between systems. The portal will maintain an internal database optimized for performance and scalability, handling operational workflows, user sessions, and cached requests independently. Emphasis will be placed on data encryption, error handling, and recovery to ensure reliability and performance consistency.

user_stories.epic_title: Secure Authentication and Role-Based Access Control
user_stories.title: Implement Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA)
user_stories.description: As a user, I want multi-factor authentication, so that my account is more secure and protected against unauthorized access.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Must support SMS, email, and authenticator app-based MFA; Option to remember device; Must comply with banking security standards.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: User can enable and configure MFA in the security settings; System sends verification code via selected method; User must enter correct code to complete login.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the user has activated MFA, When they attempt to log in, Then the system prompts for the additional verification code; Given the user enters the correct code, When they submit, Then they are granted access to their account.

user_stories.epic_title: Secure Authentication and Role-Based Access Control
user_stories.title: Implement Role-Based Access Control (RBAC)
user_stories.description: As an administrator, I want to assign roles to users, so that they can only access data and features permitted by their roles.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Roles must be configurable; Users can have multiple roles; Access is controlled based on the assigned roles.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Admin can assign roles to users; Users only see features they have permissions for based on their roles.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the user has an assigned role, When they log in, Then they only see allowed features and data based on their role permissions.

user_stories.title: Display Personalized Banking Product Recommendations
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want to see banking products and services tailored to my profile, so that I can find the most relevant offerings.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Recommendations based on user profile and transaction history; Dynamic update of recommendations as profile changes.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Dashboard shows tailored products and services; Recommendations are updated based on profile changes.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the customer has a profile, When they view the dashboard, Then they see personalized product recommendations.

user_stories.title: Provide Quick Navigation Links in Dashboard
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want quick navigation links to account management and transaction history, so that I can easily access these features.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Links must be prominently placed; Navigation should be intuitive; Users can access all accounts and transaction histories.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Dashboard includes quick navigation links to account management and transaction history; Links are functional and lead to correct pages.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the customer is on the dashboard, When they click on the account management link, Then they are directed to the account management page.

user_stories.epic_title: Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
user_stories.title: Enable Digital Account Opening Workflow
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want a digital workflow for opening new accounts, so that I can do it conveniently and efficiently.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Workflow must support document uploads; Data validation must happen in real-time; Support for saving incomplete applications.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Customers can start and complete account opening digitally; System validates data in real-time; Users can save incomplete applications for later.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the customer starts an account opening process, When they upload necessary documents, Then the system validates the documents and data in real-time.

user_stories.epic_title: Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
user_stories.title: Enable Service Modification Workflow
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want a workflow to modify existing services, so that I can update my services as needed.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Workflow must be intuitive; Support for service modification requests; Connection to backend systems for request processing.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Customers can modify existing services; Requests are processed through the backend system.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the customer wants to modify a service, When they complete the modification request workflow, Then the modification request is processed and updated.

user_stories.title: Provide Real-Time Request Status Tracking
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want to track the status of my requests in real-time, so that I can stay informed about their progress.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Status updates must be real-time; Integration with core systems to reflect live updates; Clear status indicators.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Customers can see real-time status updates of their requests; Status indicators are clear and updated live.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the customer has initiated a request, When they check the status, Then they see the real-time progress of their request.

user_stories.title: Send Automated Notifications for Key Events
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want to receive automated notifications for key events in my requests, so that I am informed about important updates.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Notifications must be configurable; Supports email and in-app messages; Event-based triggers for notifications.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: System sends notifications at key events; Notifications are sent as configured (email/in-app).
user_stories.test_cases: Given the customer has an ongoing request, When a key event occurs, Then the system sends an automated notification about the event.

user_stories.epic_title: Comprehensive Interaction History and Audit Trail
user_stories.title: Maintain an Immutable Log of User Interactions
user_stories.description: As a compliance officer, I want an immutable log of user interactions, so that I can ensure traceability and accountability.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Logs must be immutable and encrypted; Must comply with banking standards; Easy retrieval for audits.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: System logs all user interactions immutably; Logs are encrypted and retrievable for audits.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user interaction, When the interaction occurs, Then it is logged immutably and encrypted in the system.

user_stories.epic_title: Comprehensive Interaction History and Audit Trail
user_stories.title: Enable Easy Retrieval of Interaction History
user_stories.description: As an administrator, I want to retrieve user interaction history easily, so that I can analyze user activities for compliance.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Searchable logs; Compliance with data retention policies; Secure retrieval mechanisms.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Administrators can search and retrieve interaction history easily; History retrieval complies with retention policies.
user_stories.test_cases: Given an administrator needs to retrieve interaction history, When they perform a search, Then the system provides the required interaction logs.

user_stories.title: Implement Responsive Design for Multi-Device Access
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want to access the portal seamlessly across devices, so that I can use it on desktop, tablet, and mobile.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Responsive design; Supports multiple devices; Consistent experience across devices.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Portal provides a consistent and responsive experience across desktop, tablet, and mobile devices.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the customer accesses the portal from different devices, When they use it, Then the portal adapts and provides a consistent experience on each device.

user_stories.title: Ensure Accessibility Compliance
user_stories.description: As a user with disabilities, I want the portal to comply with accessibility standards, so that I can use it effectively.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Complies with WCAG 2.1; Usability for diverse needs; Includes user feedback mechanisms.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Portal complies with accessibility standards (WCAG 2.1); Usability is ensured for customers with diverse needs.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user with disabilities accesses the portal, When they use it, Then they can navigate and use all features effectively, complying with accessibility standards.

user_stories.epic_title: Core Banking System Integration and Data Management Layer
user_stories.title: Integrate Self-Service Portal with Core Banking System
user_stories.description: As a developer, I want to integrate the self-service portal with the core banking system, so that data syncs seamlessly between systems.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Secure API/middleware for integration; Real-time data syncing; Error handling and recovery mechanisms.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Portal integrates with core banking system; Data syncs in real-time with proper error handling and recovery.
user_stories.test_cases: Given data updates in the core banking system, When the portal syncs, Then the updated data reflects accurately in the portal.

user_stories.epic_title: Core Banking System Integration and Data Management Layer
user_stories.title: Optimize Internal Database for Performance
user_stories.description: As a system architect, I want to optimize the internal database for performance, so that the portal operates reliably.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Optimized for scalability and performance; Secure data management; Efficient handling of user sessions and cached requests.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Internal database is optimized for consistent performance; Data is secured and managed efficiently.
user_stories.test_cases: Given increased user activity, When the database operates, Then it handles the load efficiently without performance degradation.
